Description:
Forget the hassle of building and move right in!
This near-new home in the popular suburb of Curlewis is situated at the top end of Creekside Drive, just over 250m from the brand new Curlewis shopping centre, which is set to be an upcoming retail hub of the Bellarine, as well as being within walking distance to the Parklands and beaches that the area is so well known for.
Equally appealing to the family, couple or investor ? 63 Creekside has something for everybody. The home is characterised by 4 spacious bedrooms with built-in wardrobes, including ensuite and walk-in wardrobe in the master bedroom. This practical home also has two distinct living areas, two bathrooms, a modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances and large double garage with internal and backyard access.
Some extra features of this home include an undercover outdoor alfresco area perfect for summer entertaining, ducted heating throughout, split-system air conditioning and a fresh coat of paint throughout to add to the new feel of the home. This is great value buying in a highly desirable location, and would suit a wide range of buyers including families, retirees, couples and the clever investor who sees future growth in years to come.
Insights: 63 Creekside Drive, Curlewis VIC 3222 was last sold in 2017 and 40 other 4 bedroom house in Curlewis have recently been sold.

Description:
'Hermsley'
With magical aspects from every room, either overlooking the garden or across the bay to the "You Yangs", Melbourne and even Mt Macedon on a clear day. 'Hermsley' was built in the 1950's. The residence offers: grand entrance hall, formal sitting room with marble fire place, library with an open fire place, french doors opening onto the patio over looking the garden and bay, formal dining room, informal living area including a country kitchen, dining area and family room with superb floor to ceiling windows once again offering a magnificent outlook. 3 bedrooms, master with walk in wardrobe and ensuite, 2 further bedrooms both with built in wardrobes serviced by a central bathroom. Outside there is 7 acres of parkland, a north south mod grass tennis court, avery, double garage, machinery shed and games room. If you're seeking a fabulous lifestyle opportunity 'Hermsley' will fill all your requirements, we guarantee an inspection will impress.
Insights: 25 Avila Road, Curlewis VIC 3222 was last sold in 2016 and 14 other 3 bedroom house in Curlewis have recently been sold.

Description:
Lot 15 Shoreline is Sure to Impress in the Stunning Baywater Estate!
If you're looking for land on the Bellarine Peninsula, look no further than this large block of land approximately 884m2.
Its elevated North facing positions provide opportunities for enchanting views over Port Phillip Bay, the You Yangs and beyond to the Melbourne Skyline.
Located in the stunning 'Baywater Estate' - you can build your dream home and be only a short stroll to the foreshore and the beach! A pedestrian boardwalk provides easy access to the beach from the top of the cliff. The boat harbour is less than a km away and offers a family friendly playground plus a viewing platform.
The Foreshore Park and attractions are already proving popular with local families and visitors. Extensive areas of open space and parkland are also provided along Griggs Creek.
Your new home or holiday sanctuary is within walking distance to shops, schools, parks and the Bay.
Well connected to the charming township of nearby Drysdale and its host of established community services and networks will have you feel at home in no time!
Curlewis is set to become one of the most sought - after new addresses on the Bellarine Peninsula.
Perfectly positioned, you'll never want to leave.
For more information, be sure to enquire today!
Roncon Real Estate - An Agency like no other!
All stated dimensions and areas are approximate. Particulars herein are for information only and do not constitute representation by the Owner or Agent.
Jayden Roncon : 0416 200 715

Description:
Vendors needs this sold - all reasonable offers considered!
If you're looking for an affordable family home with more space than the rest, then take a look at this one. Situated on a generous 560m2 block approx. Within one of the Bellarine Peninsulas hottest suburbs and close proximity to the boat ramp, golf course, schools, major shops, public transport and some of the area's best wineries at your door step to unwind at the end of the day position and location is second to none.
From the moment you enter this modern family home you will be amazed at the open sense of space, with an open entrance leading to the rumpus room perfect for the kids with loads of light and space.
Opening at the end of the entrance is the central hub of the home offering dual living of lounge, dining and kitchen surrounded by large light filled windows looking out to the undercover alfresco area and rear garden.
The kitchen offers an inviting low line island bench perfect for entertaining with loads of overhead and under bench storage as well as a double pantry and SS appliance finish it off.
With 4 generous bedrooms all with built in robes, master with WIR and full en-suite.
Additional features include: Ducted gas heating, split system cooling, D/W double remote garage, C/F in alfresco, still with new home warranty. So be quick homes selling here fast
Insights: 40 other 4 bedroom house in Curlewis have recently been sold.

Description:
Delightful Family Home
Set on an excellent allotment of 512m2 with a delightful and private north facing rear garden. This splendid residence is designed to accommodate a growing family with generous room sizes throughout.
3 bedrooms all with BIRs, the master with WIR and full ensuite.
Family sized kitchen with granite look bench tops, large pantry and stainless steel appliances.
A separate study and large double garage with rear access complete the package.
Other features include ducted central heating and cooling, a covered alfresco area, low maintenance landscaped gardens front and rear including and elevated vegetable garden.
A substantial 6m X 6m colourbond shed at the rear is ideal as a studio or gymnasium.
Located in a well regarded established area with other quality homes. Close to Clifton Springs Safe boat harbour, Curlewis golf course and extensive central shopping of Drysdale township.

Description:
THE BEST OF BOTH WORLDS
If lifestyle and location are high on your agenda then look no further than this superb five acre property.
It provides instant appeal both inside and out. Next door to Curlewis Winery and surprisingly close to Port Philip Bay, Geelong, shops and schools, this two storey rustic cottage provides space and accommodation for the growing family together with plenty of scope to extend in years to come. Surrounded by extensive decking, the home comprises three bedrooms, master with ensuite and walk in robe, central main bathroom, large laundry with additional storage, mud room and open plan kitchen/ meals and living area with polished floorboards and cathedral ceiling giving the house a relaxed country feel. Add to this a separate large rumpus room which is perfect for the kids, internal access to remote controlled double garage, three bay shed, heating/cooling, outdoor entertaining area, ocean glimpses plus picturesque winery views and manicured gardens complete with an established three hole golf course that has to be seen to be believed. Whatever your lifestyle needs be assured you can unwind and indulge in the good life this property has to offer.

Description:
Do You Like Different?
So many floorplans these days are very alike. Not this home. Open plan living gives you clear views of the side and rear yard. The direct access from the garage through the laundry just makes bringing those groceries inside so much easier. Over the road from this home is an open area of green space where the kids can ride their bike, scooters, skate boards etc around the paths. Curlewis is a suburb with a new shopping complex including Woolworths a short distance away. Great family home with space for everyone. Main bedroom and ensuite at the front of the home and three bedrooms with family bathroom at the rear. Enjoy a coffee or breakfast in the alfresco area and watch the kids play at the same time.
Don't want the hassle of the build but want a new home well come visit this one.
Bellarine Peninsula has so much to offer for working, living and playing. Restaurants, wineries, cafes, bike trails, sporting clubs, golf, fishing the list goes on and on. Living here gives a real sense of belonging.

Description:
SO AFFORDABLE, AS NEW......DOWNSIZE IN STYLE OR FAMILY HOME, MAINTENANCE FREE.
Such a good size home and top position for this price. Wide entrance, separate lounge and second living with meals, kitchen and sitting area, overlooking rear garden and patio. Four bedrooms, master with WIR and ensuite, other 3 all have robes. Central bathroom, laundry and separate toilet. Features include central heating, split system, double pantry, dishwasher and more. Double garage with internal access. If you want to buy well for your $$$$$ , look very carefully at this , add a little touch to make it gleam. Park over the road, schools and shops so close and you can take a short bush walk to the bay. Vendor says offers invited.

Description:
Parkland living at it's best!
Located directly opposite Hermsley Park in the Curlewis Parks Estate, this three bedroom beauty is being offered for sale for the first time. With all of the premium features that today's buyers are looking for, including spacious bedrooms with walk-in robes, formal lounge and the 2nd informal open plan kitchen meals family room flowing onto the alfresco entertaining. A well-appointed north-west facing alfresco area with pull-down awnings allows for all year entertaining. Some other features include:
- Impressive formal entrance
- Stainless steel kitchen appliances; including 900mm freestanding gas oven, with big wide burners and rangehood
- Premium floor coverings and timber louver window furnishings
- Established gardens
- Central bathroom with separate toilet
- Well thought-out floor-plan
- Gas ducted heating throughout
- Full ensuite including bath
This home is perfect for young families, investors, retirees/downsizers or anyone looking for convenience at a winning price. Contact us today to book your private viewing!
